name: Zach Attack - All players must remain in one group and crouched at all times (Most commonly known as the Zach)
Ole Yeller - It a teammate goes down, kill them
I Like This Point of View - Lean left or right the entire round
Stormtroopers - Hipfire only - No shotguns
The Fapper Sapper - Must put a sock on your mouse hand before the round starts
The Turtle - Shields on back only
Old West - Recruits using revolvers and shields
The Long Way Round - No breaching charges
Hero Mode - Only one person can enter the objective room at a time
Follow the Leader - All players must use the same doorways / entry point
Dakka Dakka Dakka! - Spetnatz recruit LMG only and can only open doors/windows/breach using it
Team America - Must use only FBI operators and enter through the main entrance
Window Washers - Must enter and exit any buildings through windows
The Tansey - DMR iron sights
Statue - Players are not allowed to move while shooting
EZ Mode - Must stop and type EZ in the chat after every kill before moving/shooting
Ammo Conservation - All guns must be put to semi-auto
Gladiator - Only one attacker may enter the building at one time. Go in hot.
Designated Marksman - Glaz and all shields. Shields must protect Glaz.
Running Late! - Stay in spawn until the last 45 Seconds
Southpaw - Must play with arms crossed. Off-hand on mouse and mouse hand on keys.
